title: Crypto chaos: Which coins could actually boom in 2025
description: Experts say Bitcoin's still a safe bet, but in a market full of scams and hype, spotting crypto's next cash cow is the ultimate challenge.

title: Cryptos regain some momentum dragged higher by a strong Bitcoin
description: Cryptocurrencies are regaining momentum with Bitcoin up over $1,000 on the session and altcoins like Solana, Avax and Dogecoin testing cycle highs. Risk-on sentiment remains strong despite slight equity pullbacks and the Crypto Market Cap is slowing its correction â€“ What's next for the digital asset market?
